733.3012 0.83995997 2018 Q1 -22.434002 738.4447 -5.64069779 2018 Q2 41.917620 743.6182 2.23422722 2018 Q3 -28.542501 749.1186 0.83394758 However when I try to fit the data into auto.arima: fit I get the following error: Error in optim(init[mask], armaCSS, method = optim.method, hessian = FALSE, : non-finite value supplied by optim I get the same error when trying different specifications of auto.arima using same data: fit Question: Why am I getting the error? Am I skipping any steps in my use of auto.arima (differencing, seasonal adjustment, moving averages, etc.).
